name: Astro Blast: LCD impossibLED
description:
A retro nostalgic style LED arcade game based on our other super realistic simulation games from the 80's like Astro Command/scramble and Galaxy Invader. This completely new original game is a fusion of old style arcade and new recent games but keeping that retro vibe. Includes realistic simulated L.E.D. display. Incredibly easy to learn but incredibly challenging to play.

(a bug has been spotted related to Apples iAds -just restart app and should all be fine until we update - please be patient)

Note: As this is a free version, it contains ads. Paid version will be available soon.

Simple game play:
Avoid the "towers" and navigate the "catacombs"
Blast away obstacles to fly through.
Avoid the enemy missiles firing at you from below.
One hit and adios!
Gain points and missiles for every obstacle you manage to avoid.
Hold down for thrust and let go to fire missile.
Simple right?
Supports Game Center to challenge your friends.

Warning: Contains challenging if sometimes frustrating moments similar to "Flappy Bird". If you like Flappy Bird then here is a unique twist on it. If you suffer from a nervous disposition or rage then check out our fart stylophone instead "parpophone".


If this interests you, check out our emulated tabletop retro arcade games emulations.


Thank you for looking.
